key_test.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           KEY_TEST
00004 !
00005 !   Function to test whether key present in 
00006 !  local hash table 
00007 !   
00008 !
00009 ! ===========================================
00010 
00011 function key_local(keyin)
00012 
00013   use treevars
00014 
00015   implicit none
00016   integer*8  :: keyin
00017   integer :: cell_addr, link_addr, ires
00018   logical :: resolved
00019 
00020   logical :: key_local 
00021 
00022   cell_addr = IAND( keyin, hashconst)     ! cell address hash function
00023 
00024   if ( htable( cell_addr )%key == keyin ) then
00025      key_local = .true.       ! Keys match -> found entry
00026      return
00027 
00028   else if (htable(cell_addr)%link == -1) then
00029      key_local = .false.   ! Keys don't match, and no link here => key not in # table!
00030      return
00031 
00032   else 
00033      link_addr = htable(cell_addr)%link  ! Go to link address
00034      ires = 0
00035 
00036      do while ( link_addr /= -1 )       ! Repeat until keys match or run out of links
00037         ires = ires + 1
00038         if ( htable( link_addr )%key == keyin ) then
00039            key_local = .true.      ! Keys match -> found entry
00040            return
00041         else
00042            link_addr = htable(link_addr)%link    ! Next linked entry
00043         endif
00044      end do
00045 
00046      key_local=.false.  ! Not resolved: key not in table
00047 
00048   endif
00049 end function key_local
